name: High Card Flush
description:
High Card Flush and the following demo are the property of Galaxy Gaming.

Click here to learn more about High Card Flush on the Galaxy Gaming product page.

This is a playable digital game demo of the proprietary table game High Card Flush from Galaxy Gaming. Click here to play the live version on the Galaxy Gaming website.

This was the internal beta for testing purposes throughout app development.

Click "Run game" and maximize your web browser using F11, or adjust the size of your browser to your preference.

Downloadable Windows build will run significantly faster.

  • F11 to toggle fullscreen
  • R to restart app
  • Escape to close app
